snippet: A suicide bomber linked to al Qaeda drove a car laden with explosives into a hospital used as a base by Yemen's Shi'ite Muslim Houthi movement on Sunday, killing at least 15 people,  and five more died in an ambush in the south of the country....

headline.print_headline: Militants Kill 20 in Two Separate Yemen Attacks: Sources
headline.main: Militants Kill 20 in Two Separate Yemen Attacks: Sources

lead_paragraph: A suicide bomber linked to al Qaeda drove a car laden with explosives into a hospital used as a base by Yemen's Shi'ite Muslim Houthi movement on Sunday, killing at least 15 people,  and five more died in an ambush in the south of the country.
